properties.title: Forge Breadcrumb Plugins - How to install

section.name: Install

subsection.name: Prerequisites
subsection.p: These instructions assume that you have an Hippo project based on the Hippo Archetype 7.9.1, i.e. a Maven multiproject consisting of at least three submodules: cms, site and content.

li.p: Add the plugin version to the main pom.xml of the project
Note: always check for the latest version number and compatibility with the project
Add the following dependency to the site pom.xml of the project
Note: always check for the latest version number and compatibility with the Site
Rebuild your project using Maven and go to configuration.

section.p: Note: on Hippo 7.8 and later, if you want to add this to an existing repository, be sure to use startup option -Drepo.bootstrap=true for initializing the types, see Content Bootstrap
